title: Travel Validity
description: High season supplement fee (10.12.2022 - 20.12.2022): 500 AED per person
High season supplement fee (20.12.2022 - 05.01.2023): 800 AED per person

title: Easy Cancellation
description: Unredeemed vouchers can be cancelled anytime for a minimal fee of only AED 150 per voucher.
Voucher can be used for other person as well

title: Easy Visa
description: We highly recommend to apply for E-visa prior to travel to avoid long queues and extended waiting time.
Nationals of other 69 counties are not required to obtain a visa
We will assis you in the visa process.
